item.description:
FREE MUSEUM OF ART & OR LUNCH  Saturday Dec. 8th. join us at anytime after 11 am.
Museum is only free 10AM.,12PM.                                                                                    Meet in the museum lobby at 11 am., or meet us just for lunch in the cafeteria.              Buy or bring Lunch, 12 to 2pm.
CURRIER MUSEUM OF ART
150 ASH STREET
MANCHESTER, NH 03104
http://www.currier.or...

( A Child FRIENDLY EVENT )
Host: Steve Obermiller   603-491-1962    ob@tds.net

This is my rainy day event. The last time it rained on a Saturday we had 12 people attend. They all really seemed to enjoy the event, and all asked to have it done again. So, please join Steve O. and friends for a pleasant mornings stroll through the Currier Museum of arts in Manchester NH.. The museum offers Free Admission for everyone, every Saturday from 10am - 12pm. So, come view some of the fantastic works of art. Meet some new people, and enjoy lunch afterward with some great conversation. Steve O. is an Artist / Sculptor / instructor, and has his BA in Commercial Art. So, he will be happy to offer any insight he can into any of the works there. We may be lucky enough to even get a tour at 1pm. from the museum also. After our museum walk, we will have something to eat around noon time in their beautiful cafeteria. It is located in the center of the museum. Bring your own food and drink, or just buy it there. Their food is a little pricy. But, it is so good!!
Please contact Steve O. for my details.

NOTE: There are also Family Saturdays. They are the second Saturday of the month:
'Spend some quality family time at the Currier the second Saturday of every month. Participate in hands on art activities, go on a guided family gallery walk (11:30 am), visit the new
Discovery Gallery, or use a family gallery guide. Each Family Saturday will focus on a different theme.'
item.name: Art Museum & or Lunch
